name: 异世界杂货铺 skyscraper in Another world
name_original: 异世界杂货铺 skyscraper in Another world
description:
Before purchasing, you can understand the basic gameplay and overall quality of the game through the page introduction, video, and pictures.
This game is independently developed, you can report bugs encountered in the game in the following ways:
Steam Community Forum

Game introduction
You will play as a businessman, running a grocery store, make money through retail and other methods, and then continue to grow and develop with the goal of becoming the first chamber of commerce on this continent

Basic gameplay
  • Selling goods: By signing contracts with suppliers, purchasing goods, and then selling them to various customers to earn the difference.
  • Place facilities: By building various facilities and rooms, attract customers to spend and increase income.
  • Adventure collection: Go on adventures on various maps, collect raw materials, and obtain special items.
  • Build production: By building various commodities by yourself, you can reduce dependence on suppliers and gain greater profits.
  • Pet cultivation: Adventurers can capture all kinds of monsters and bring them back for cultivation. As a partner of adventurers, they can increase their combat power.
